mapper.select: SELECT id, money, start_net_worth, code, start_sale_net_worth, end_sale_net_worth, start_time, sale_time, status, create_time, sale_money FROM tbl_fund_order WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT IGNORE INTO tbl_fund_order ( money, start_net_worth, code, start_sale_net_worth, end_sale_net_worth, start_sale_share, end_sale_share, status, sale_money, start_time, sale_time ) VALUES ( #{money}, #{startNetWorth}, #{fund.code}, #{startSaleNetWorth}, #{endSaleNetWorth}, #{startSaleShare}, #{endSaleShare}, 0, #{saleMoney}, #{startTime}, #{saleTime} )
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_fund_order SET money=#{money}, start_net_worth=#{startNetWorth}, start_sale_net_worth=#{startSaleNetWorth}, end_sale_net_worth=#{endSaleNetWorth}, start_sale_share=#{startSaleShare}, end_sale_share=#{endSaleShare}, code=#{fund.code}, status = #{status}, sale_time=#{saleTime}, update_time = now() WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE tbl_fund_order SET status=1, make_share=#{makeShare}, sale_net_worth=#{saleNetWorth}, sale_share=#{saleShare}, sale_time=#{saleTime}, sale_money=#{saleMoney} where id=#{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_fund_order_ratio (fund_order_id, code,net_worth, ratio,update_time) VALUES ( #{fundOrderId}, #{code}, #{netWorth}, #{ratio}, now() ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE ratio=VALUES(ratio),update_time=VALUES(update_time),net_worth=VALUES(net_worth)
mapper.select: SELECT CASE a.status WHEN 0 THEN a.start_time END as time, a.start_net_worth, CASE a.status WHEN 0 THEN '买入' END as name FROM tbl_fund_order a where a.code=#{code} and a.status=0
